reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 360/00: Tax Matters - Tax Ratio for Hilton Township
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS—TAX RATIO FOR   HILTON TOWNSHIP
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 360/00: Tax Matters - Tax Ratio for Hilton Township
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1.The requirements set out in subsection 363 (32) of the Act do not apply for the 2000 taxation year with respect to property in the industrial property class in Hilton Township. O. Reg. 360/00, s.1.
content.raw_html: 1.The requirements set out in subsection 363 (32) of the Act do not apply for the 2000 taxation year with respect to property in the industrial property class in Hilton Township. O. Reg. 360/00, s.1.
